籤詩版本二:
Zimanenedwa kuti sizodziwika, zovala zabwino ndi malipiro abwino zidzabweretsa kulemera
Osakumbukira zomwe zidachitika nthawiyo. Mukuvomerezabe nane.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chithunzi cha mwana akuwona amayi ake.
Zabwino zonse kwa anthu onse olemekezeka.
解曰: Amagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati chiyembekezo. Aliyense ali wokondwa. Kuchokera ku gulu la anthu. Monga mwana kukumana ndi amayi ake.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Zhong akufunafuna achibale
Dong Zhong anali mwana wa Dong Yong mu Mzera wa Han. Iye anabadwa kwa nthano yochokera kumwamba yomwe inabwera padziko lapansi kudzakwatira Dong Yong. Pambuyo pake, nthanoyo itathandiza Dong Yong kubweza ngongole zake ndikudziwombola, adabwerera kumwamba.
Dong Zhong, yemwe anali ndi zaka 7, nthawi zambiri ankachititsidwa manyazi chifukwa analibe mayi, choncho ankafuna kuwapeza.
Motsogoleredwa ndi Bambo Yi, Dong Zhong anapita ku Phiri la Taibai kuti akamuyang'ane pa July 7. Nthanoyo inawonekera ndipo potsiriza inawona amayi ake.
聖意: Ndilibe mtendere kunyumba, ndine wamba, ndikupempherera zabwino, zabwino pa bizinesi, ukwati ndi ukwati, mkazi woyenda pansi ku Liujia akutchinga munda, mphutsi za silika zili m'mavuto, zimavuta kupeza anthu chifukwa cha imfa ya ziweto, n’kovuta kuimba mlandu, kusamuka n’kosunga, katundu wotayika alibe, matenda akupempherera zabwino zonse m’mapiri ndi m’manda.
第X籤: Lotale ya makumi asanu ndi asanu ndi awiri
